name: A Letter For The King
description:
Game 2/50

Made using the theme "A war game where you unite citadels but you have limited control." generated using https://orteil.dashnet.org/gamegen. but like last time, the game ended up nothing like the theme but who cares.

This is a simple isometric platformer where you have to deliver a letter to the King. See if you can get past all of the obstacles and reach then end!
